definition: to address/to search for address/to input data into memory

sentences.english: No administration capability to control service addressing and naming exists.
sentences.chinese: 目前还没有用于控制服务寻址和命名的管理功能。

sentences.english: There are actually two addressing modes that don't access memory at all.
sentences.chinese: 有两种寻址模式实际上根本就不会访问内存。

sentences.english: The cache occupies the same addressable memory space as the applications.
sentences.chinese: 缓存与应用程序占用相同的可寻址内存空间。

sentences.english: The new classes allow applications to support one or both of the addressing schemes.
sentences.chinese: 新的类允许应用程序支持一种或这两种寻址方案。

sentences.english: These different ways are called addressing modes.
sentences.chinese: 这些不同的方法就称为寻址模式。

sentences.english: Wood boxes, searching coding switch, Double FM channels.
sentences.chinese: 木质外箱，可寻址解码开关机，调频双通道。

sentences.english: Working on a 32-bit system, you can address 4 GB of memory, out of this 2 GB is typically reserved to the Operating System and 2 GB are allowed for each user mode process, such as w3wp.exe
sentences.chinese: 工作在32位系统上，可以寻址4GB内存。

sentences.english: Addressing and flow control are also similar in both layers.
sentences.chinese: 在这两个层上，编址和寻址以及流控制也是类似的。

sentences.english: Components expose services that can be invoked through addressable interfaces.
sentences.chinese: 组件公开了可以通过可寻址接口调用的接口。

sentences.english: So dynamic languages effectively add a level of indirection.
sentences.chinese: 所以动态语言有效地添加了一级间接寻址。

sentences.english: The most obvious addressing mode for accessing main memory is called direct addressing mode.
sentences.chinese: 访问主存最显而易见的寻址模式称为直接寻址模式。

sentences.english: The most obvious addressing mode for accessing main memory is called direct addressing mode.
sentences.chinese: 访问主存最显而易见的寻址模式称为直接寻址模式。

sentences.english: We will talk about addressable memory later.
sentences.chinese: 我们在后面会谈到可寻址内存。

sentences.english: The relevant bits are extracted and used as an index to address the LUT.
sentences.chinese: 提取相关的位并将其用于寻址LUT的索引。

sentences.english: I also fixed a zero-page protecting bug along with added minor fixes.
sentences.chinese: 我还修正了0页面寻址的BUG和一些小差池。

sentences.english: The use of other addressing modes is covered later in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本文后面讨论其他寻址模式的使用方法。
